tags.name: media-quote
tags.description:
`media-quote`
`A quote focused around a piece of media with citation and optional caption`

Attributes:

  * `src` {`string`} - 

  * `alt` {`string`} - 

  * `quote` {`string`} - 

  * `author` {`string`} - 

  * `author-detail` {`string`} - 

  * `caption` {`string`} - 

  * `filter` {`boolean`} - 

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `src` {`string`} - 

  * `alt` {`string`} - 

  * `quote` {`string`} - 

  * `author` {`string`} - 

  * `authorDetail` {`string`} - 

  * `caption` {`string`} - 

  * `hasFilter` {`boolean`} - 

  * `_isCaptionOpen` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasAuthor` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasAuthorDetail` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasCaption` {`boolean`} - 

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

attributes.name: accent-color
attributes.description:
`accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

Property: accentColor

Default: grey

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description:
`dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?
